ygData.subject: Re: Vampiric embrace or lifetap?
ygData.msgSnippet: Just as a quick note, the Necro and SK VE are the same spell but do totally different damage.  The question is: Why?  It should work the same for both classes.
ygData.messageBody:
Just as a quick note, the Necro and SK VE are the same spell but do totally
different damage. The question is: Why? It should work the same for both
classes. I don't see a Rangers heal do less then half of a druids. Or a
paladians heal do half of a clerics for the same spell. If the spell is
going to act differently should have a different name.


From: "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...>

Lifetaps are very slow, a level 20 necro can hit/heal about 74 hp using
lifetap.

Morgul the black
